ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Cinderella: Age of Darkness
ComicInfo.Summary:
Grimm Fairy Tales fan-favorite bad girl finally gets her own series and she doesn't plan to disappoint. As the Age of Darkness continues, Cindy is given a task that only pure evil would be willing to carry out. And she's more than ready!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Mike Krome & Ula Mos | 1 | B | Cover B | Emilio Laiso & Sanju Nivangune | 3 | C | Cover C | Cris Delara | 4 | D | 2014 Wizard World Tulsa Exclusive Cover, Limited to 500 | Jamie Tyndall & Ula Mos | 2 |
